quoteText: While we do not knowingly share Personally Identifying Information about you through the Steamworks API such as your real name or your email address, any information you share about yourself on your public Steam Profile can be accessed through the Steamworks API, including information that may make you identifiable.
title: Your personal information is not shared with third parties for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data
tosdr.tldr: No “Personally identifiable information” is shared with third parties for marketing purposes.
